info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Iredell and west central Rowan Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Statesville, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Statesville, Troutman, Lake Norman State Park, Mooresville, Lake Norman, Mount Ulla and Doolie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
